# StarPattern
package com.payilagamtest.java;

public class StarPattern {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		for(int i=1;i<=5;i++)
		{
		for(int j=1;j<=i;j++){
			System.out.print("* ");
		}
		System.out.println();

	}

}
}
